short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record network traffic and save as a HAR file for LoadForge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record your browser actions and save them as a HAR file for LoadForge load testing. Then replay your actions at scale!

LoadForge will automatically parse out any 3rd party scripts and services, and allow you to load test your infrastructure with ease.
